trans-unit.source: Passenger flight on-time performance data taken from the TranStats data collection of the U.S.
trans-unit.target: Passenger flight on-time performance data taken from the TranStats data collection of the U.S.

trans-unit.source: The dataset covers the time period April-October 2013.
trans-unit.target: The dataset covers the time period April-October 2013.

trans-unit.source: Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:
trans-unit.target: Before uploading to Azure ML Studio, the dataset was processed as follows:

trans-unit.source: The dataset was filtered to cover only the 70 busiest airports in the continental US
trans-unit.target: The dataset was filtered to cover only the 70 busiest airports in the continental US

trans-unit.source: Cancelled flights were labeled as delayed by more than 15 minutes
trans-unit.target: Cancelled flights were labeled as delayed by more than 15 minutes

trans-unit.source: The following columns were selected: Year, Month, DayofMonth, DayOfWeek, Carrier, OriginAirportID, DestAirportID, CRSDepTime, DepDelay, DepDel15, CRSArrTime, ArrDelay, ArrDel15, Cancelled
trans-unit.target: The following columns were selected: Year, Month, DayofMonth, DayOfWeek, Carrier, OriginAirportID, DestAirportID, CRSDepTime, DepDelay, DepDel15, CRSArrTime, ArrDelay, ArrDel15, Cancelled
